Texts.Chs:
这些太空狼热爱能量武器和科技。他们敏捷而又极其灵活，几乎可以在任何地形上航行。

^orange;食性^reset;：肉食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
+^green;Staying fed ^green;increases movement^reset; (max 16.6%)
+^green;5% ^green;power, +^green;12%^reset; Energy
Resist: ^green;20%^reset; Shadow, ^green;20%^reset; Radiation
Immune: Slush, Snow, Soil, Mud, Web and Sandstorm effects

^orange;环境^reset;：
Gain additional power and health in ^green;Lush, Forest and Tundra^reset; biomes
^green;40% Hunger Reduction^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
Firearms: ^green;+3%^reset; Crit Chance, ^green;+25%^reset; Energy Regen

^red;弱点^reset;：
Weak: ^red;20%^reset; Cosmic, ^red;-20%^reset; Poison
Texts.Eng:
Space wolves with a love for energy weapons and tech. They're swift and extremely mobile, navigating almost any terrain, but a tad on the fragile side.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Staying fed increases speed (max  +^green;16.6^reset;%)
  Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, Energy x^green;1.12^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: ^green;20^reset;% Shadow, Radiation, Fire, ^green;30^reset;% Ice
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slush, Snow, Soil, Mud, Web and Sandstorm effects

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Lush, Forest and Tundra^reset; biomes: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Health x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Energy Weapons: +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, Poison. -^red;30^reset;% Electric
  Max Food x^red;0.6^reset;
